page.title: 01Mothers working day
page.content: A DAWN TO DUSK DIARY OF MY MUM MY MOTHERS DAY STARTS AT 7.15 WHEN SHE GETS UP. SHE MAKES SANDWICHES FOR DAD AND MATTHEW. WHEN EVERYONE ELSE IS UP MUM MAKES THE BREAKFAST.WHEN EVERYONE IS FINISHED SHE GETS WASHED AND DRESSED. AFTER A WHILE SHE WASHES UP AND I DRY. MUM GETS OUR THINGS READY FOR SCHOOL AND TAKES DAD TO WORK. WHEN SHE GETS BACK SHE TAKES MATTHEW AND I TO SCHOOL.MUM GETS HOME ABOUT 9.00 AM AND SOME DAYS SHE GOES TO WORK UNTIL I.00 PM.IF SHES NOT AT WORK SHE DOES COOKING, KNITTING AND DECORATING. SHE WORKS IN THE GARDEN AND MAKES JAM. MUM HAS HER LUNCH AT ABOUT 1.30 AND READS THE PAPER. THEN SHE DOES THE VEGETABLES FOR TEA AND MAKES THE PUDDING.AT 1.00 PM ON A THURSDAY SHE GOES TO SCHOOL TO HELP.THEN AT 3.15 PM SHE MEETS US FROM SCHOOL. WHEN WE GET HOME MUM FINISHES GETTING TEA READY.
